Description: We Help Early Stage Founders Bring Their MVPs to Market in under a Month.
Full Description: Byldd is a venture studio that's democratizing software entrepreneurship. We help early-stage founders bring their MVPs to market in under a month and for less than $10K. Specifically, we’re reducing the time and cost of building software by using pre-built modules and automation. It’s scaffolding on steroids for your product, allowing us to give it a massive kickstart, save thousands of engineering dollars, and go to market in weeks, not months. In 2020, the founders we worked with acquired 10K new users and generated more than $3MM in revenue. We work specifically with domain-expert founders to help turn their visions into profitable software businesses without breaking the bank. Reach out to schedule a free product road-mapping session and get a quote. Or read on to learn more about our process. We help founders refine their ideas, identify critical pain points and solutions, build the appropriate SaaS solution, get their first customers and then scale up. We have years of experience consistently and systematically building scalable, investor-ready web and mobile businesses that do over $1MM in revenue and support tens of thousands of users. We use this experience to partner with business-side and industry-expert founders to bring their tech-enabled business ideas to life. Not only that, Byldd uses proprietary AI and automation tech to write code, reducing the number of human engineering hours needed to launch a software business. We’ve done it so many times, we’ve automated the process. For founders like you, this means a 2 month kickstart on your development timeline and a massive discount of the cost of development. We leverage our years of startup development experience to offer a lot more by designing for scalability, user retention and optimal user experience for the market you’re trying to serve. We help you become aware of technical tradeoffs and make informed decisions that prevent technical debt and scalability bottlenecks based on what’s best for your business. We have a systematic, step-by-step process in which we guide you every step of the way, converting your initial concept and domain expertise into a working, in-your-hands software product ready for the market. On the way, we’ll refine your offer, make sure we’re implementing all the user retention and scalability tips and tricks to set you up for success.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Software

Description: Kegstand manufactures lightweight beer kegs that save brewers money
Full Description: Kegstand builds kegs that are 40% lighter than the current industry leading standard. With lighter kegs, brewers can reduce injuries due to handling kegs, lower distribution costs, and reduce their carbon footprint.  Our kegs are the worlds first COPV (Composite Overwrapped Pressure Vessel) kegs. COPV has been used for decades in the aerospace industry and for firefighter's air tanks. Wellen’s active aging platform (www.getwellen.com) offers personalized, science-backed fitness programs that help women build and maintain strong bones. Description: Visual note-taking app for creative people that combines the best from text editors and whiteboards.
Full Description: Think, write, and organize your thoughts based on cards and tabs. Structure and enrich all of your ideas in one place. Our app puts three core values to the fore: simplicity, visualization, and consensus. By creating an infinite canvas where cards, much like sticking notes, resemble a neatly organized collection of inter-related ideas. They serve as units of thoughts with clear borders, displayed on a squeaky-clean white canvas. To preclude the document from becoming messy as the number of cards augments, we betted on functions that are clear-cut and intuitive. They include drag’n’drops; deep dive; tabs within a document; embedded pictures, videos, and links; sub-pages. As a result, the users get a well-organized, easy-to-navigate space. Rather than providing bits and pieces of scattered information, the tool gives you a bird’s-eye view of the cards, creating the big picture. Pillared by simplicity and visualization, the app offers a collaborative space for teams to work together in real-time, sharing cards and elaborating on ideas.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Other, Software

Description: Unlocking the secrets of longevity with Rejuve.Bio: AI-powered therapeutics for a longer, healthier life.
Full Description: Rejuve Bio, led by its visionary CEO, Kennedy Schaal, stands at the forefront of biotechnology, pioneering breakthroughs in the realms of longevity and aging science. Kennedy Schaal, an accomplished leader and a driving force behind the company's mission, brings a wealth of expertise and passion to the table. Under Kennedy's guidance, Rejuve Bio has emerged as a trailblazing force in the field of aging research. Her extensive background in biotechnology and her commitment to advancing human health have propelled the company to new heights. Kennedy's leadership extends beyond the boardroom, as she actively contributes to the scientific community, collaborating with renowned experts and institutions to drive innovation in longevity science. One of Rejuve Bio's notable achievements is its pioneering work with Methuselah Fly DNA, a model organism that sheds light on the genetic underpinnings of longevity. Kennedy's leadership has enabled the company to harness the potential of this genetic resource and leverage it for groundbreaking discoveries. Furthermore, Rejuve Bio's success is bolstered by its strategic partnership with SingularityNET, benefiting from advanced AI support that augments their research and predictive capabilities. This collaboration underscores Kennedy's visionary approach to leveraging cutting-edge technology for the betterment of human health. Kennedy Schaal's unwavering dedication to precision, prediction, and personalized longevity treatments defines Rejuve Bio's mission. With Kennedy at the helm, Rejuve Bio is poised to redefine the future of human aging, offering hope and innovative solutions to those seeking longer, healthier, and more fulfilling lives

Full Description: Winnow is an AI-powered recruitment platform that transforms how in-house teams source, screen, and engage clinical providers. It is a data science-driven solution that unlocks predictive physician insights and untapped connections to support an organization’s provider recruitment and retention strategies. The company's AI model identifies predictive matches for each open role and surfaces relationships of potential candidates with existing providers. The model also predicts which physicians are likely to change jobs and where they are most likely to relocate. These insights equip medical leaders and in-house recruiters to drive novel candidate options, and referrals, and create perfectly aligned provider teams.

Full Description: As the beverage market shifts from sugar laden ready-to-drink beverages to lighter drinks such as hard seltzers, consumers are increasingly looking for a better, healthier value proposition in their beverages. Hard seltzer brands in particular were built and grown on a foundation of consumers who sought healthier lifestyles. However, as it turns out, hard seltzers don’t deliver on the promise of a comfortable and healthy drinking experience. Carbonation, despite being the market norm, leaves room for bloating and general discomfort and makes it difficult to enjoy more than just one or two beverages. Founded in 2019, NOCA Beverages (which stands for NO CArbonation), was brought to market as the next evolution in the beverage industry. NOCA is a non-carbonated spiked water. Think hard seltzer without the bubbles. NOCA is naturally gluten free, has 95 calories, 2G sugar, 3G carbs, and 4.5% ABV.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Consumer Goods, Food and Beverage, Health Care
Founders: Alex Febonio, Galen Hand, Richard Roy

Description: Package Tracking with Tracking Number
Full Description: In the interconnected world we live in, the need for reliable and comprehensive package tracking services has never been greater. As a global leader in the industry, we take pride in our extensive network of 1122 couriers spread across the world. Our commitment is to provide you with a seamless and secure package tracking experience, ensuring your parcels are monitored at every step of their journey. Couriers 1122 Worldwide Our expansive courier network spans across 1122 destinations globally, ensuring that no matter where your package is headed, we have a presence. This extensive coverage guarantees that you can rely on us for tracking parcels sent or received from virtually any corner of the globe. Effortlessly track your packages online with our user-friendly interface. We understand the importance of real-time information, and our system is designed to provide you with up-to-the-minute updates on your parcel's location and status. Whether it's a local or international shipment, our tracking service has you covered. We prioritize the security of your information. Unlike some tracking services, we do not store any data you provide. Your privacy is paramount, and our commitment to securing your information is unwavering. The package tracking data you receive is sourced directly from courier services through a secure HTTPS connection, ensuring that your sensitive information remains confidential.

Description: AI Mental Health Crisis Detection & Intervention to reduce & prevent; veteran & civilian suicide, homicide, mass violence & sexual offenses.
Full Description: Company Name: LifeLine.vet (SDVOSB) Business & Product Idea: LifeLine.vet is an AI journaling and assessment tool designed to detect and intervene in mental health crises, including suicidal, homicidal, terrorism-related ideation, as well as issues related to mental health disorders like schizophrenia, depression, anxiety, PTSD, and Military Sexual Trauma (MST). The company aims to help the veteran community, active duty, agencies, and civilians by providing MH caregivers and/or Leaders timely crisis intervention and support through AI-driven assessments. One of the primary goals is to prevent tragic events like suicide or the next Sandy Hook. Company Mission: LifeLine.vet's mission is to engage mental health teams, families, and leadership to reduce suicides, prevent homicides, stop mass violence, and support clinicians and leadership in their roles. The goal is to provide a supportive tool that allows professionals to focus on their work with reduced stress, knowing that an AI system is helping monitor and address mental health concerns. Target Market: The primary target markets for LifeLine.vet include veterans, active duty military, therapists, coaches, Ketamine Assisted Psychotherapy Clinics, the United States Government, the Department of Defense (DoD), Veteran's Affairs, 501(c)(3) organizations, military/government commands, clinics, psychologists and front lines around the globe and off planet for research missions, not just war.
Headquarters Regions: West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Government and Military, Health Care, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software, Transportation

Industries: Business Intelligence, Cloud Data Services, Database, Information Technology, Software
Description: Hydra is an open source Snowflake alternative. We transform Postgres into a fast, scalable data warehouse.
Full Description: Hydra is an open source Snowflake alternative that transforms Postgres into a fast, scalable data warehouse. With Hydra, engineers can standardize both transactional and analytics workloads around the familiar Postgres syntax, tools, and ecosystem without app code changes. Hydra offers a fully managed cloud instance with columnar storage and high throughput writes. In addition, Hydra decouples Postgres' query layer from compute and storage to enable developers to run Postgres queries across any database. Hydra's mission is to end vendor lock-in and standardize on developers' favorite open-source database, Postgres.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Internet Services, Software

Description: Coupler.io is an all-in-one data analytics and automation platform that empowers organizations to gain the most from their data.
Full Description: Coupler.io is a data automation and analytics platform that allows you to export and consolidate data from different apps to Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, Google BigQuery, and Looker Studio. In addition, Coupler.io provides a data analytics service to cope with custom data transformation and data visualization tasks. Coupler.io supports 280+ integrations to collect data from multiple business apps in spreadsheets or data warehouses and create custom auto-updating reports in Looker Studio, Power BI, Tableau, and other BI tools. The supported data sources include Airtable, Xero, Pipedrive, HubSpot, Quickbooks, Jira, Google Sheets (IMPORTRANGE alternative), and many more.  In addition, Coupler.io offers custom integrations to ensure its users have all they need to get their data analysis ready.  All in all, Coupler.io gives a live feed of raw data in a simple format, allowing you to access, share, and analyze it easily. It is designed to provide a full-scale solution for your data needs — from reliable tools to top-notch data analytics & workflow automation services.  Multiple advanced features allow users to organize and prepare their data in a breeze. Automatic data refresh on a schedule is designed to keep the data always up-to-date. The data stitching allows you to combine data from multiple sources or accounts into a single destination. With the outgoing and incoming webhooks, it’s possible to create complex workflow automations from triggering importers to launching other apps and notifications. The platform also allows you to transform your data before loading it to the destination. This includes column management, data filtering and sorting, and even adding calculable fields. Pricing: You can try Coupler.io with its free 14-day trial. After this, you can choose one of the three pricing plans according to your needs. Support & feedback: Our team is working hard to create the product you’ll love! The extensive knowledge base and an A-rated support team are always there to help you with any questions and offer guidance on more advanced capabilities of the platform - be it via email or a video call. Feel free to submit any feature or support request at contact@coupler.io Extra capabilities: Coupler.io also provides a data analytics service to efficiently solve any data management tasks for you - from building a custom dashboard to setting up data analytics in your organization from scratch.
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, New England, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Software

Full Description: In 2019, the establishment of Johnstown Heights Behavioral Health, formally known as Johnstown Heights Behavioral Health, embarked on its influential journey. Boasting a team of 250 committed professionals, its mission was unmistakably focused: to deliver compassionate and effective treatment for those struggling with mental health issues and substance use disorders. Rapidly, it cemented its position as a pivotal entity in behavioral health. Focusing on Behavioral Health, the organization dedicates itself to tackling mental health challenges and substance use disorders. Its dedication is steered by an in-depth understanding of the myriad challenges individuals face on their paths to mental wellness. The organization's approach is anchored in collaboration with various community groups, non-profit organizations, emergency responders, and mental health professionals. This collaborative strategy ensures that services are precisely tailored to meet the unique needs of its patients, creating a solid support network for those in need. Guided by a vision of empathy and insight, the organization acknowledges the difficulties many encounter in recognizing their mental health issues. It has created a nurturing environment for treatment, where seeking help is supported and promoted. Extending beyond traditional therapy methods, the establishment broadens its scope to include community outreach programs, educational initiatives, and assistance for families and caregivers of those affected. It is more than a healthcare provider; it is a collaborator in the community, a champion for mental health, and a beacon of hope for numerous individuals.

Using any mobile device you now have the ability to connect your store, allocate products, and pick-pack-ship orders from a modern interface with seamless barcode scanning and printing. Happy fulfilling!

Description: AI-powered contextual computer vision ad platform
Full Description: LensAI is an AI-powered contextual computer vision ad solution that monetizes any visual content and fine-tunes targeting through identifying objects, logos, actions, and context and matching them with relevant ads. The core of LensAI Technology is associative thinking AI algorithm that, when applied to the digital advertising industry, automatically selects and embeds relevant ads into any content consumed by users in real-time. LensAI prioritizes first-party relationships and targets audiences based on the content they are interested in and drawn to, not personal information about users. LensAI does not depend on cookies or alternative user-level identifiers while enabling Advertisers to reach relevant audiences by tailoring ads to the context. As users have become very particular about the kind of ads they want to see, LensAI focuses on providing value with every ad. To make it more fun, LensAI's in-image and in-video ads look like shopping hints that users may have seen in video games rather than traditional ads. The analytics engine of the LensAI technology measures how every ad performs contextually and how different contexts perform against each other and in general. LensAI takes digital advertising to a new level with value, relevance and no privacy hackles.

Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Media and Entertainment
Description: Katch is making genre obsolete, providing programmers and streamers unparalleled insight into why we like what we like
Full Description: Katch is a data analytics company that provides marketers and content producers with audience insights derived from the Katch Media Genome.  Hollywood is in trouble: too many new choices in movies, series, and streaming platforms have consumers frustrated deciding what to watch. Meanwhile, the very same streaming services are desperately competing for subscribers, with new platforms emerging each week.  The legacy system of Hollywood needs a new way of understanding and analyzing content–an empirical, objective way of organizing itself. Enter the Katch Media Genome, an advanced language that captures the unique, personalized reasons why we like what we like. Designed by Dr. Nolan Gasser, architect of the original Pandora Music Genome and author of Why You Like It: The Science and Culture of Musical Taste, the genome is the foundation of Katch’s analytics and recommendation technology. Using the Genome, Katch has built a series of Media Market Indexing products that predict where a film or series will perform better or worse across cities, countries, and even demographics. Like the “Google Maps” of filmmaking, we tell you where you should go, how to get there, and which routes to avoid.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Media and Entertainment, Science and Engineering, Software
Founders: Andrew Tight, Jacob Clifton, Kyle Haley, Nolan Gasser

Description: StylizeNOW is a mobile on-demand platform to provide hair care and nail care to customers' location.
Full Description: StylizeNOW owns and operates a platform (available on iOS Apple Store, Google Play Store here, and a website www.stylizenow.com.) The holding company’s name is Now Technologies, Inc., and is incorporated in Delaware. The corporate website is https://www.nowtechnologiesinc.com. Doing business as StylizeNOW, our platform provides on-demand services that cater to customers’ residences. For now, the platform focuses on salon services; haircuts, hair coloring, nail services, and eyelash care. StylizeNow contracts with licensed professionals that agree to provide these services to customers that use the StylizeNow mobile application. Similar to other on-demand service providers, our company does not employ these professionals but contracts with individual professionals that provide these services and send them to customers that use our platform. This platform specifically is not an online marketplace but an on-demand service. Customers simply go on our platform and select what service they desire, and our platform will immediately begin to set them up with a provider and send this provider to their homes. We feel that given the extraordinary times we live in, coupled with the rise in sharing services and the git economy, not to mention that a lot of the professionals in these fields are currently out of work, due to shutdowns, that the times leave open a promising opportunity to allow customers to avoid the hazards of going inside an indoor public space with dozens or even hundreds of people. Also, our platform allows these professionals to continue earning money while the shutdowns continue. We hope that it will catch on and eventually we can expand beyond merely salon services to other industries and customers will continue to like the service even after the end of the shutdowns and we return to normal activity. Our platform is currently available to customers in the San Antonio and Austin metro areas with the goal of expanding if business allows. We eventually hope to expand statewide and afterward nationally. We were founded in May 2020 and launched on January 8th, 2021.
Headquarters Regions: Southern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Consumer Goods, Internet Services, Mobile, Software, Transportation

Description: Cyborg Security is a pioneer in threat hunting, delivering threat hunting and detection content for an array of security platforms.
Full Description: Cyborg Security is pioneering threat hunting and detection software with its HUNTER platform. Hunter enables security teams to deploy advanced behavioral content in their environment with no extra tools, appliances, or resources. The HUNTER platform delivers threat hunting and detection packages for security platforms like SIEM, data lake, and EDR.  Our packages feature an analyst-first approach that guides analysts through the investigation. Every package includes platform content, analyst-focused runbooks, and threat emulation. The packages detect the latest techniques, attacks, and exploits observed by threat intelligence. And each package is also tagged and enriched with MITRE ATT&CK, Kill Chain, Diamond Model, and more. Hunter's smart mapping technology saves organizations time and helps them avoid costly re-engineering efforts. The technology maps and tailors every package to organizations' unique environments. The packages also come with detailed deployment guides enabling seamless and rapid deployment.  During an investigation, the focus should be on security, not accounting. Cyborg Security uses a straightforward "all-you-can-eat" model, without the complexity of micro-transactions. This ensures organizations have the content when they need it. Begin Your Hunt with Cyborg Security. Visit cyborgsecurity.com to learn more!

Description: First-ever SaaS to get more from your elevator maintenance contract
Full Description: If you’re confused and frustrated by your building maintenance contracts, you’re not alone. (In fact, we think it makes you perfectly normal.) Maintenance contracts make it difficult for just about everybody to understand. At AuditMate, it’s our job to cut through the confusion.  Imagine if handling contracts were the easiest part of your job. You’d automatically know when to expect repairs, how to file disputes, and who to contact. You’d save time, money, and energy. It’s not too good to be true—it’s simply the next step in building maintenance technology.    Built by veterans of the elevator industry, AuditMate is a first-of-its-kind SaaS product for property owners and managers. We take the mystery out of maintenance contracts so you can get the most out of what you signed up for. Maintaining your building can be a hard job, but understanding your contracts doesn’t have to be.  AuditMate gives property owners and managers a leg up on their jobs—not just because it saves them time and money, but because it’s the right thing to do.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Professional Services, Software

Description: BitCard is a financial company issuing & distributing Bitcoin Gift Cards through retail distribution channels. - The Blackhawk Network
Full Description: Bitcoin Solutions, Inc (BSI), operating under the trade name "BitCards®," is a privately owned C-Corporation that has been at the forefront of innovation in the gift card industry since its inception in 2018. What truly sets us apart is our game-changing strategic partnership with The Blackhawk Network, the undisputed leader in the retail space boasting an impressive network of over 300,000 retail locations nationwide. We take immense pride in announcing that BitCards® stands as the only cryptocurrency product officially approved by The Blackhawk Network. This pivotal collaboration propels us into a realm of boundless opportunities, enabling us to extend our digital and physical Bitcoin gift cards to both online and brick-and-mortar stores. BitCards® isn't just about purchasing Bitcoin; it's about providing consumers with the benefit of converting all of their B2B rewards, airline miles, points, loyalty rewards, B2C incentives, corporate payouts and gaming/casino Payouts directly to Bitcoin. This, in turn, simplifies and streamlines the transition to cryptocurrency, rendering it more accessible and convenient for individuals from all walks of life. We've created a pioneering product that reimagines the concept of access to Bitcoin through the familiarity of conventional gift cards. BitCards®, in its essence, has reshaped how individuals embark on their journey into the cryptocurrency market. By rendering the purchase of Bitcoin more approachable and user-friendly, we empower people to explore and embrace the thrilling potential of cryptocurrency. We continue to pioneer innovative solutions, transforming the way people access and utilize gift cards, Bitcoin, airline miles, points, loyalty rewards, and incentives. The BitCards® name is synonymous with Bitcoin gift cards and financial empowerment.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, Great Lakes, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Other, Payments, Software
Founders: Ben Rabb, Edward Gieske, Steve Bradbery

Description: Aurora Bio is a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company developing a platform of immunotherapies and an imaging diagnostic.
Full Description: Aurora Bio is a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company developing a platform of immunotherapies and an imaging diagnostic for multiple systemic amyloid diseases, including AL, ATTR and ALECT2 amyloidosis. The diagnostic imaging agent is currently in Phase 1 with a planned Ph 3 to potentially initiate in 2020. The company also has 2 pre-clinical stage therapeutic programs being developed for a broad range of systemic amyloid diseases. The immunotherapies consist of a peptide-fusion protein as well as cell therapy utilizing engineered macrophages (CAR-M) to remove amyloid. Currently, there are no approved treatments for 29 out of 30 systemic amyloid diseases While approved therapies in ATTR, and those in development for AL an ATTR, target the pre-cursor protein of individual amyloid diseases, Aurora Bio’s goal is to develop immunotherapies that treat across all systemic amyloid diseases.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Caller ID Reputation® is an industry-leading B2B SAAS platform and diagnostic tool that monitors your caller ID and number health
Full Description: Caller ID Reputation® is an industry-leading B2B SAAS platform that monitors a business’s outbound calling numbers used for outbound dialing campaigns and daily business calls to connect with customers and prospective clients. With over 3.7 million flags identified to date, Caller ID Reputation is a diagnostic tool that protects the integrity of businesses by identifying flags across the major carriers, data sources, and mobile call-blocking apps & operating systems, giving a complete view of an organization’s number health. Caller ID Reputation’s health checks of outbound numbers at the geographic, device type, and even carrier level make it the only truly ubiquitous service of its kind in the US and represents the last mile of the call flow, giving businesses control over how they get displayed across the telephony channel. The organization is committed to bringing transparency and visibility to legitimate enterprises with unique technology that increases contact rates, improves brand reputation, and optimizes outbound calling performance. Learn more at calleridreputation.com.

Industry Groups: Education, Financial Services, Health Care, Information Technology, Other, Social Impact, Software

Full Description: Dotlas, a company co-founded by Nuno Freitas and Eshwaran Venkat, is pioneering the retail industry's future by introducing the world's first fully conversational no-code AI platform designed for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs).  The platform is built on a vast database  which includes all food and beverage retailers across the United States, product catalogs, advertisements, social media trends, reviews, foot traffic data, and more. Dotlas transforms raw data into actionable insights through proprietary models, eliminating the need for intricate number crunching or SQL queries. Dotlas operates on a data-driven business model, offering subscription-based access and monetizing the sale of APIs and data sets. There are different tiers of pricing for basic, standard, and comprehensive data packages, which cater to businesses of various sizes and data requirements. The company projects significant revenue growth over the next year and is led by a diverse and experienced team.

Description: SaaS text-to-speech app, beta release phase, pre-seed
Full Description: ioAudio.io converts text documents into streaming audio so you can listen to your important messages, notes, files, and other text while exercising, working, multi-tasking, or traveling. Our web and mobile app services increase the productivity and safety of people in most industries, including those that work from home to road warriors. Our deep learning algorithms use artificial intelligence, natural language processing, and machine learning to automate the editing process so you save time on editing documents for speech synthesis. Description: CareAdvisors builds technology platforms that enable the elimination of disparities and inequity in healthcare.
Full Description: CareAdvisors is on a mission to improve healthcare equity in the U.S. We are a fast-moving, minority-owned technology company that helps millions of individuals gain rapid access to healthcare and social service benefits by automating the manual enrollment process taken on by healthcare providers. Our technology also enables healthcare organizations to reduce uncompensated care costs and delays in treatment and payments. We are led by a founding team that has over 10 years of experience building community resource directories that address social needs and access to care. Patients shouldn’t feel alone in the healthcare process. An individualized approach is key to the overall patient experience. Their navigators provide one on one assistance to patients and their families. They train their team to overcome the barriers to receiving quality healthcare. Their programs are created to train future workers to embrace their various backgrounds and use diversity of thought and experience to meet the needs of all patients. Community health rests heavily on access to health coverage and the ability to serve populations. That is why they train health advocates to become health professionals. They offer health navigation training for job readiness, along with college prep learning for academic success. Health navigators play a vital role in the coverage to care model under the Affordable Care Act. Their programs are created to train future workers to assist local communities. They have programs to introduce you to this field or continue with your learning. Contact us to learn more about their trainings. There are numerous processes within healthcare that impact patient care. Healthcare begins with accessibility. At the moment of contact, a well strategized health informatics system can gather patient information and assess gaps in care to evaluate future outcomes. The Patient Innovation Center is building a new way to health management and the systematic processes for patient and community health. They offer a research pipeline that connects the collegiate world to local communities. Their Health Informatics program emphasizes the real world application of data along with the information technology used to analyze and produce dynamic information that improves outcomes in health. They offer training solutions to bridge the gap between patient data and health outcomes. The Navigator Program offers a seminar based learning environment led by senior health navigators working in the field. In addition to the mandated government learning requirements, students are educated on cultural barriers to enrollment using real life examples. They emphasize that going the extra mile is critical for enrollment success.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Chicago Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Health Care, Media and Entertainment, Professional Services

Description: HawkTower is a modern venture firm focused on backing entrepreneurs in Central California and the Monterey Bay Area.
Full Description: Central California is enriched by tourism, agriculture, viticulture, research, military, and natural wonders. These elements come together most acutely in the Monterey Bay Area. HawkTower champions enterprises and endeavors linked to this region and, thus, differentiates itself as an aspirational investor for entrepreneurs focused on Central California and the Monterey Bay Area. HawkTower represents strong convictions, long-term focus, and a unique, regionally-focused investment thesis.  HawkTower will launch a venture capital fund in 2024, HawkTower Ventures, and a regional startup accelerator program across the Central Coast and Valley, with a hub in Monterey. HawkTower will invest in entrepreneurs establishing roots in Central California, serving local corporations and industry, supporting the objectives of local institutions and foundations, collaborating with local colleges and universities, returning to where they lived/studied previously, receiving PhDs from local universities, and graduating from local colleges.  Founders and companies will benefit from having HawkTower on their capital table alongside other investment firms. We are “boots on the ground” in Central California. We maintain strategic relationships, partnerships, and memberships with community-based organizations, institutions, elected and appointed government officials, local corporations, influential SMBs (e.g., wineries and hotels), academia, and more. Our value proposition is differentiated; thus, our firm can become aspirational for entrepreneurs who see innovation and commercialization potential in Central California.

Description: Actifai, an AI-powered customer engagement platform, allows cable and telecom providers to match individual customers with optimized offers.
Full Description: Actifai is the only AI-powered customer engagement platform that allows cable, media, and telecom providers to match individual customers with a single optimized offer. Maximizing customer satisfaction and lifetime value begins with presenting subscribers the offer that’s right for them, based on their circumstances, intended use, and alternatives. Our unique approach, using proprietary data, machine learning, and artificial intelligence to identify a single recommended offer for individual customers, has increased providers’ ARPU by an average of 12% since the day we launched. ---------- Our platform: We’ve tailored our platform to focus on functionality that augments daily sales and support engagements and prioritized keeping that functionality natural and intuitive. Under Actifai’s hood are four technology building blocks shaped for real-life users, improving the customer and agent selling experience on day one. Data Discovery - Unparalleled access to proprietary data, combined with technology that gathers external information key to customer decision-making, all in real-time Machine Learning - Expertly designed machine learning models that analyze each unique customer situation against over a million previous customer offers and buying outcomes AI Decisions - Powerful AI identifies the single offer recommendation best suited to an individual customer and optimized for conversion, ARPU, and CLTV Dynamic Rationale - Descriptive selling points, contextually tailored to an individual, provide the rationale that motivates customers to choose the offer that’s been recommended to them ---------- Impact: Across tens of thousands of daily customer engagements, our platform's technology has helped providers gain an edge in acquisition, increase average basket size, retain customers profitably, improve online conversion, and win in new markets. We measure ourselves by our customers’ success – that’s why we’re proud of the results they’ve achieved.     - 22x Average ROI   - 30% New-sale Conversion Improvement    - Up to 14% ARPU Lift   - 17% Year-one Customer Retention Improvement   - 2x Add-On Product Upsells ---------- Our Story: Actifai’s first deployment was in partnership with a leading regional provider — we continue to view our customers as partners, even as our commitments have grown. We’re proud of the relationships we’ve built with providers across North America and the trust they’ve placed in us to solve many of their toughest challenges with AI.  *100% of customers who’ve piloted actifai have rolled out our technology* Customers (Q1/2-2023):   - Cogeco Communications   - Altafiber   - Hargray   - breezeline   - Hawaiian Telcom   - WOW! ---------- Products: Actifai’s platform addresses business needs across the customer lifetime with a suite of products for acquiring, retaining, and expanding customer relationships. All are powered by the same dynamic technology and available in our single, unified platform. Actifai Engage Actifai Digital Actifai Upsell Actifai Retention Actifai B2B

Full Description: SurgeTrader stands out as a game-changer in the prop firm industry, offering a unique one-step funding model that fosters trader success. In stark contrast to other firms that profit from trader failure, SurgeTrader is dedicated to the triumph of its traders. Through a seamless process, traders participate in an Audition featuring straightforward rules and no time restrictions. Our primary aim is to see traders succeed, so we've eliminated the complexities found in multi-step funding models or programs burdened by stringent rules and time constraints. Here's how it works: Traders undergo an Audition in a demo environment, honing their skills until they achieve a 10% profit target. Once this milestone is reached, they are granted valuable login credentials to a funded account, with the potential to trade with up to an impressive $1 million. SurgeTrader is committed to providing an environment where traders can thrive, armed with the necessary tools and opportunities to reach new heights in their trading journey. Join us today and become a part of our thriving community of successful traders, where your ambitions are supported, and your success is celebrated!
